programme.title: Headliners Replay
programme.desc: The paper review that won't put you to sleep (like the others). Join the all-star comedy cast for an intelligent and insightful look at tomorrow's headlines tonight. Hosts Simon Evans, Andrew Doyle and Leo Kearse.

programme.title: UK National Anthem
programme.desc: “God Save the King” is broadcast each morning at 0559 on GB News – Britain's News Channel.

programme.title: Breakfast with Stephen and Anne
programme.desc: It's Stephen and Anne here. Join us for the weekend breakfast show Britain is turning to. News from around our great country and the world is live here on GB News Breakfast.

programme.title: Saturday Morning Live with Esther...
programme.desc: …and Philip. Welcome the weekend with the husband and wife duo – both serving MPs – as they celebrate the country's triumphs in their Best of British feature, and look at the good news where you are.

programme.title: Quipu: Calls for Justice
programme.desc: Esperanza and Teodula are calling for justice in rural Peru, part of 300,000 people sterilised without consent more than 18 years ago. The Quipu Project is their phoneline that allows victims across the country to share their shocking testimonies and ensure those responsible are punished.

programme.title: The Battle for Myanmar's Buddhist spirit
programme.desc: In Myanmar, different groups of Buddhist monks are battling with how to deal with the country's minority Muslim population. While some advocate peace, others, such as the extremist Ma Ba Tha, are stoking up hatred and violence. The Guardian visited Myanmar to investigate how the monks' actions are threatening to destabilise the country's newly established democracy

programme.title: Lupita
programme.desc: In a country where indigenous people are increasingly displaced and journalists are killed at an alarming rate, a courageous new voice has emerged: Lupita, a Tzotzil-Maya woman at the forefront of a Mexican indigenous movement. Twenty years after Lupita lost her family in the Acteal massacre in southern Mexico, she has become a spokesperson for her people and for a new generation of Mayan activists.

programme.title: Second innings
programme.desc: From Afghanistan to London, three boys build a new life playing cricket. Tucked away in suburban south London, matches take place every week for young and often traumatised asylum seekers. Many have fled war and have been separated from their families. The Refugee Cricket project, organised by the Refugee Council, provides not only a chance to play and make friends, but also to access advice and support as they navigate the complex asylum system and other challenges in their new home

programme.title: Lady of the Gobi
programme.desc: On Mongolia's coal highway to the Chinese border, truck driver Maikhuu dreams of a better life and financial security for her three children. However, the road from the mines to China is riddled with accidents, toxic pollution, poor hygiene and now, amid the Covid crisis, drivers face days of quarantine on the border. Trapped in a hazardous industry, Maikhuu's journey reflects the human and environmental costs of Mongolia's mining boom.

programme.title: Leonora Carrington: Britain's lost surrealist | Rembrandt's portraits at the National Gallery
programme.desc: Leonora Carrington escaped a stultifying Lancashire childhood to run off with Max Ernst and hang out with Picasso and André Breton in 1930s Paris. She fled the Nazis, escaped from a psychiatric hospital in Spain and became a national treasure in Mexico. What happened to one of Britain's finest - and neglected - surrealists? | A revealing look at Rembrandt's most intimate portraits, on display in the locked-down National Gallery in London.

programme.title: Happy birthday
programme.desc: For years, global music publisher Warner/Chappell claimed copyright of the Happy Birthday song, demanding payment for any public performance of it. Jenn Nelson tells the story of her four-year campaign to prove that the company did not in fact own the rights to the world-famous song, whose tune was composed by two sisters in Kentucky in 1893. A judge's decision on 30 June to approve a $14m settlement means the song is now in the public domain

programme.title: Garth Nix answers your questions: on JRR Tolkien, gaming and pronouncing characters' names
programme.desc: In an ongoing series, Guardian Australia is getting kids and young adults to do the hard work instead of us – by interviewing their favourite authors. Here, the author of the Old Kingdom/Abhorsen, Seventh Tower and Keys to the Kingdom fantasy series opens up about queer representation, perfectionism and his writing tips.

programme.title: Forcing cyclists to wear helmets will not save their lives | Do cyclists think they're above the law
programme.desc: Bicycle helmets are compulsory in countries such as Australia and New Zealand, among others, but as the Guardian's Peter Walker explains this does not help save lives. | Cyclists can be a nuisance, running red lights, riding on the pavement ... but are they dangerous, and if not, is it a problem if they break the law?

programme.title: Space to Be: the fight to keep this Belfast women's centre open
programme.desc: In the heart of the Village, a loyalist area in Belfast, the Windsor Women's Centre has fought a 30-year battle to keep its doors open. The centre, an oasis for vulnerable women, is deeply rooted in the community. As it faces financial insecurity and navigates the pandemic, will these women make it through their toughest year so far?

programme.title: The golden poison dart frog | If you eat beef, don't wash
programme.desc: The golden poison dart frog: 'Like holding a loaded gun' | The solution to California's drought: if you eat beef, don't wash

programme.title: Somali Night Fever
programme.desc: In the 1970s and 80s Mogadishu's airwaves were filled with Somali funk, disco, soul and reggae. Musicians rocking afros and bell-bottom trousers would perform at the city's trendiest nightclubs during the height of the country's golden era of music. But it was short-lived: a brutal civil war began, musicians fled to all corners of the world and the vibrant music scene came to an end.

programme.title: The secret world of Asian drag queens | Oklahoma rodeo: 'I can be gay and I can be a cowboy'
programme.desc: The secret world of Asian drag queens | Oklahoma rodeo: 'I can be gay and I can be a cowboy'

programme.title: Life in the Arctic | The poets taking on climate change
programme.desc: Life in the Arctic: how climate change is killing a culture | High ice and hard truth: the poets taking on climate change

programme.title: Climate carnage: whose job is it to save the planet?
programme.desc: In November last year, the world's gaze focused on Glasgow at Cop26 as 'a historic, collective achievement' was forged between 200 countries – the Glasgow climate pact. Since then, unprecedented global events have threatened this commitment to limiting climate destruction, and the hopes of 'keeping 1.5 alive' have been dashed. We follow Fiona as she prepares for Cop27 in Egypt, asking presidents, global leaders, activists and scientists if global diplomacy is enough to save humanity from the brink of annihilation.

programme.title: Where the River Runs Red
programme.sub-title: a mining community caught between the past and a sustainable future
programme.desc: In the isolated west of Tasmania an ominous red river divides the small mining town of Queenstown. A result of copper run-off from a closed mine, it is an ever-present reminder of the town's history of environmental and industrial disaster. Where the River Runs Red explores a community in an economically crippled area caught between the past and a future that is less reliant on a mining economy.

programme.title: Nowt but a fleeting thing
programme.desc: A film about a young farmer's connection to the land, his animals and a changing world in the north of England. Battling against unsustainable farming methods and an unenthusiastic market, Adam Crowe continues to work on two neighbouring farms while fighting to launch his own business and breed a flock of sheep. In rural Britain, the threat of poverty is often frighteningly close

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Golden Years
programme.desc: When Arthur and Martha Goode find that their pension pot is virtually worthless they decide to take drastic action - by robbing a bank! After their first robbery is successful they start to like the criminal lifestyle and so decide to rob even more, but as the banks get bigger and the robberies get riskier will they be able to outwit the police as they close in? In the vein of "Lady In the Van" and "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel", Golden Years is a hilarious British heist thriller that shows just because you're getting old doesn't mean you have to stop having fun.

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Dr. Emma Lloyd (Uma Thurman) is a popular New York radio DJ whose sensible, practical love advice is listened to and loved by women everywhere. Off-air, her own life is equally successful with wedding plans to dependable fiancé Richard (Colin Firth) running smoothly, until that is she makes a chocking discovery: she's already married – and to someone else! With her life turned upside down, Emma franticly sets out to track down the mystery man to annul the marriage. However, as the truth unfolds, she discovers that following her own advice might not be as easy as she thought…

programme.title: Instructions Not Included
programme.desc: Valentin is Acapulco's resident playboy, until a former fling leaves a baby on his doorstep and takes off without a trace. Leaving Mexico for Los Angeles to find the baby's mother, Valentin ends up finding a new home for himself and his newfound daughter. An unlikely father figure, Valentin raises Maggie for six years, while also establishing himself as one of Hollywood's top stuntmen to pay the bills, with Maggie hilariously acting as his on-set coach. But their unique and offbeat family is threatened when Maggie's mother shows up out of the blue, and Valentin realizes he's in danger of losing his daughter - and his best friend.

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.

programme.title: Earthsea

programme.desc: Caught in a battle between Allied and German Forces, a modern day 757 mysteriously travels back in time to 1940. In their desperation to return home safely, the plane's passengers manage to turn the tide that wins the war in Europe.

programme.title: 300 Spartans The Real Story
programme.desc: 300 Spartans-The Real Story. Putting aside the myths and legends, this documentary takes a detailed look at the Battle of Thermopylae in 480 BC Greece leading to the last stand of the 300 Spartans and Spartan King Leonidas. On the 3rd day of the battle, when Leonidas was being surrounded, he sent most of his troops away and covered their retreat with a last stand because Spartans never retreated.

But after the death of her military father, she and her mother are in danger of losing their family ranch too. With a little help from friends and their majestic white horse, they hatch a plan to raise enough money to save the ranch while learning to never lose hope, despite all odds.

programme.title: Our Dream Wedding
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Natalie tries on her grandma's 'magical' wedding veil and is transported to her future, where she and long-term boyfriend Scott are happily married with two beautiful children. Is she finally ready to commit?

programme.title: Retreat to Paradise
programme.desc: Ellie tends to the injured and cantankerous Jordan as he heals from a shoulder injury. Though he struggles to learn to use his arm again, his attitude leaves Ellie wanting to leave him in his misery. But as they get to know each other more, Jordan starts to see Ellie is exactly who he wants in his life, and hopes Ellie feels the same way.

programme.title: The Baby Proposal
programme.desc: Layla Bennett and Derek Dray are the hosts of Wake Up, Chicago and for the folks at home, their chemistry is undeniable. Derek is incredibly protective about the format of Wakeup, Chicago while Layla is always looking to shake things up. One morning they discover an adorable baby named Poppy left in a basket in Laylas dressing room. The mother passed away and the caretaker is unable to care for Poppy and is convinced that Layla and Derek will make perfect parents.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A bounty hunter escorts a killer to be tried for murder, but allows the man's outlaw brother to catch up with them to have a showdown over a previous shocking murder.

programme.title: Pawnee

programme.title: Silver Lode
programme.desc: In Silver Lode, Dan Ballard is arrested by 4 Marshals for murder and theft but he denies the charges and searches for the real culprit even as the townsfolk start abandoning him.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: Molly And Lawless John
programme.desc: In New Mexico, a sheriff's unhappy mid-aged wife aids a condemned prisoner escape her husband's jail and elopes with the young and attractive outlaw to Mexico, pursued by the sheriff's posse.

programme.title: Made For You, With Love
programme.desc: The owner of a second hand wedding dress business breathes new life into used dresses, making dreams come true for brides unable to afford pricey gowns. But when she meets the perfect guy, she's afraid to give her own heart a second chance at love.

programme.title: Cinderella Pact
programme.desc: Nola, Deb, and Nancy are best friends who create a Cinderella Pact—a weight loss agreement using advice from "fairy godmother" newspaper columnist Bel.

programme.title: Romance Retreat
programme.desc: After a big breakup, journalist Dana Willingham finds herself alone and stuck at a couple's yoga retreat while the biggest story of her career breaks far away. And she doesn't even like yoga! But maybe the universe has put her here for a reason, because the handsome loner staying at the lodge turns out to be Stefan Gonzales, the tech guru at the center of the scandal. As she gains his trust to expose him, she finds herself falling in love with him. Now she must use the lessons from yoga to choose: the perfect story or the perfect man?

programme.title: Detective McLean
programme.desc: Allison and Devin investigate the breakdown of a star student at the high school and the teens deal with the social fallout of having Allison on campus.

programme.title: Foodiverse
programme.desc: A story about adventure and growth. An unconfident dumpling girl fights against villains to save her homeland. Finally, she finds herself and wins the true love.

programme.title: Captain Sharky
programme.desc: Pint-sized swashbuckler Captain Sharky thinks he's the most dangerous pirate on the Seven Seas. To prove his bravery, he sets sail with Mikey, a well-behaved boy whose life Sharky has turned upside down, and Bonnie, a trouble-shooting girl who tends to assume command in every situation. This motley crew sails for big adventures as they thwart the plans of The Admiral and Old Bill the Pirate.

programme.title: 12 In a Box
programme.desc: At a school reunion dinner in a remote country mansion, a dozen people are offered the chance to collect a million pounds each if they can stay on the estate, cut off from the outside world, for 96 hours. With deaths, sexual intrigue, kidnapping, and spiralling levels of farce and confusion, the action barely pauses for breath as it heads towards its Will-they-or-won't-they-succeed climax.

programme.desc: When Diana inherits half her uncle's vineyard, she is surprised to find a rule requiring her to work the land with new co-owner Seth or risk losing the land.

programme.title: A Moving Romance
programme.desc: After inheriting her family's moving company, a young woman starts to clash with the manager who thought he was going to take over.

programme.title: Undercover Angel
programme.desc: When a little girl prays for a miracle to help her recently divorced mother settle in their new town and fixer-upper house, an angel posing as a handyman, is sent down from heaven to help. While trying to accomplish his mission, the angel falls for the mother, ultimately forcing him into the unlikeliest of choices.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mother's death and her father's mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: Just for the Summer
programme.desc: Teacher Penelope Campbell loves visiting her Grandma Dot every summer – despite her constant attempts to find Penelope a man! This year, she bumps into her childhood sweetheart Jason Humphrey, who explains his grandmother is desperate to pair him off, too. In order to evade the efforts of their matchmaking grandmothers, they pretend to date – but will it ignite old sparks?

programme.title: Hint of Love
programme.desc: A cookbook literary agent with culinary training is tasked with helping elevate the brand of a food channel personality known for his convenience-oriented recipes. However, as the agent works with her client on a new cookbook, playfully clashing over everything from ingredients to tastes, she must choose between following the directions or her heart.

programme.title: Listen Out for Love
programme.desc: Peyton Pepper, a goal-driven podcast producer, is forced to mold Alex McKinney, a brash loose cannon, into her next star and create the perfect show to save both of their careers. That show comes in the form of finding Peyton's iconic idol, true love. But as the duo goes along for the ride, they are the ones who find love--once they open their hearts and listen.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: What would you do if you thought you only had one week left to live? Would you radically change what was left of your life? Re-evaluate your values and priorities? Those are the last questions in the world that Lanie Kerrigan (Angelina Jolie) thought she'd ever have to face. A feature reporter at a Seattle television station, Lanie thinks her life is perfect. Perfect job. Perfect apartment. Perfect wardrobe. Perfect boyfriend.

programme.title: Breaking at the Edge
programme.desc: A pregnant woman fears for her unborn child's life if she doesn't avenge a supernatural entity.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: A wife tired of standing by her devious husband is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.

programme.title: Far From Home
programme.desc: Upon the death of his estranged uncle, an embittered writer returns home to the idyllic San Juan, WA islands.

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent begins to notice a pattern in a kidnapping case. A new lead leaves her questioning her theory.

programme.title: Fairytale: Story of the Seven Dwarves
programme.desc: A mash-up of everyones favourite fairy tales, this adventure has everything from tap-dancing dragons to brave little dwarves and a romance between Sleeping Beauty and Jack (of the Beanstalk fame). When Bobo, the youngest of the seven dwarves, accidentally pricks Princess Rose and sends the kingdom into a century-long slumber, Bobo and the other dwarves go on an adventure to revive Rose...

programme.title: Ruth and Alex
programme.desc: Hollywood heavyweights Morgan Freeman (Driving Miss Daisy) and Diane Keaton (Manhattan) unite to redefine the term coming of age in this heart-warming story about life, love and real estate! When a couple opts to put their apartment on the market over one crazy weekend, they discover that finding a new place is not about winding down but starting a whole new adventure!

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: Featuring the king of comedy Kevin Hart, this hilarious, unconventional and heartfelt journey is all about love, loss and other felonies! Discontent parole officer Walter is struggling with the humdrums of married life, when three troublesome ex-cons are placed under his supervision. Little does Walter know that these eccentric strangers are the inspiration he was looking for!

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You
programme.desc: Expect to fall in love with Woody Allens first musical, where wit and sophistication fuse in melodious harmony. With a star-studded cast, including, Julia Roberts, Drew Barrymore, Tim Roth, Goldie Hawn and Natalie Portman. Set in some of the worlds most romantic cities, this whirlwind of intertwining tales, focuses on one familys search for love. A romantic comedy that is unmissable!

programme.desc: The Postables take on a road trip to track down a boy who may have been kidnapped. Starring Eric Mabius (2016)

programme.title: An Emma Fielding Mystery: Site Unseen

programme.desc: Marley, who is known for organising dream proposals for her clients, is yet to find true love. But her luck might be about to change when work takes her out of town. Starring Erin Agostino. (2022)

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor who has shunned the kindness of his neighbours is forced to change his ways when he is asked to look after his young granddaughter. Stars Diane Keaton, Michael Douglas (2014)

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: EMPEROR is a gripping tale of love and honour forged between fierce enemies of war, a story inspired by true events, of the bold and secret moves that won peace in the shadows of postwar Japan. Matthew Fox,Tommy Lee Jones in the iconic role of General Douglas MacArthur, newcomer Eriko Hatsune and Toshiyuki Nishida bring to life the American occupation of Japan in the perilous and unpredictable days just after Emperor Hirohito's World War II surrender.

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Donovan Matheson (Danny Glover) is a man trapped in the past. Once an esteemed physicist, he worked on the Manhattan Project but in the years that followed, he became engulfed in regret, which soon turned into an obsession with finding a way to use his work to do good. When his wife and child died in an accident Donovan blamed himself and his work for failing to stop it from happening. Thirty years on, Donovan returns to his home town, but instead of a welcome return he finds himself plagued by déjà vu and caught up in events that echo his family's tragedy.

programme.title: Iron Fury
programme.desc: In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles. A time of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love and legendary miracles, this is a time for heroes. 'Iron Fury' is a visceral assault on the senses featuring some of the most heart stopping and authentic skirmishes ever seen on film.

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: It's been five years since the death of Philip's brother Ronnie, a devastating blow that has torn the Chase family apart. When they receive a visit from Melissa, Ronnie's former girlfriend at the time of his death, wounds are re-opened. Heavily pregnant, Melissa is under the belief that her unborn baby belongs to Ronnie, leaving the Chase family angry and incredulous. Stranger things have happened. But the truth is altogether more alarming...

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: It's just another day on the job for a band of renegade rescue workers as they defy death in the middle of a war zone. Somewhere in the Balkans, over the course of 24 breathless hours, Mambrú (Benicio del Toro), leads his team of humanitarians, including hard-bitten, wisecracking veteran B (Tim Robbins) and new recruit Sophie (Melanie Thierry), as they deal with an unexpected crisis. Through it all, the group handles the less-than-glamorous realities of life in a combat zone the only way they know how: with selfless bravery and a healthy dose of irreverent humour. From the director of ‘Loving Pablo' and ‘The Good Boss'.

programme.title: Walt Before Mickey
programme.desc: The legendary Walt Disney had a tumultuous childhood, yet he was determined to overcome obstacles in his path, before the creation of his first iconic character: Mickey Mouse.

programme.title: The Architect

programme.desc: Alex Wheeler (CLAIRE DANES) and her husband Greg (JIM PARSONS) are approaching a crossroads that is all too familiar to New York City parents - finding the ""right"" primary school for their son, Jake. Joe. programme.title: Shake My Beauty
programme.desc: 25-year-old personal trainer and part-time student Liberty developed cystic acne when she was 17 years old. After hiding her condition behind layers of foundation for years, can she face her biggest fear and go for a night out in image-obsessed Essex without any makeup? Hannah is a quad amputee who lost her limbs to meningitis as a baby. She now celebrates her differences and inspires others through YouTube videos and spoken word poetry. Allyson survived breast cancer and had an incredible tattoo to help her accept her mastectomy scars and reclaim her body. Since then she has walked the catwalk in New York as part of a special cancer survivors' show...

programme.title: Shake My Beauty
programme.desc: Angi lost half her body weight - 250lb - after a gastric bypass and intense crossfit training. But her dramatic weight loss has left her with a lot of excess skin, especially on her legs. Can she overcome her insecurities and wear a bikini in public for the first time ever? Nova has polycystic ovarian syndrome, and one of her symptoms is excess hair growth. However, with the support of her partner, Ash, Nova has embraced her hair, and now has a full beard.

programme.title: Shake My Beauty
programme.desc: Kiley's alopecia began when she was just 4 years old, and she has worn wigs or hats ever since to cover her hair loss. A couple of years ago she lost her eyebrows too, which she now draws on every day. She wants to challenge herself to go out in public without her wig or eyebrows for the first time ever. Will she be able to go through with it? Carmen suffers from lymphedema, which means she has an accumulation of fluid in her legs. But she's determined to celebrate her body by modelling on Instagram.

programme.title: Shake My Beauty
programme.desc: Miranda has suffered with excess body hair since her teens. After years of shaving, a year ago she finally started to embrace the hair and let it grow - and has even found the courage to show her arms and shoulders. However, showing her legs remains an obstacle that she's desperate to overcome - can she find the strength to visit the local water park with her legs on display and swim in front of crowds of people?

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: Examining the devastation caused in Carlisle when severe flooding in 2015 left most of the city underwater just before Christmas. Flood victims Stu and Jo reveal their disbelief when their family is left homeless, and aside from dealing with the aftermath of the deluge, they have to contend with the threat of opportunistic looters. Cameras also cover a disastrous basement conversion in a North London flat, a botched boiler installation in Manchester, and a Shropshire-based rental nightmare.

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: Cameras focus on Paul and Kim, a couple whose Northern Ireland home was invaded by a colony of breeding rats, and Warren, whose London flat was beset by leaks after builders began constructing another two storeys on top of his home. Plus, Marnie reveals how she became allergic to her own Greater Manchester home, and Devon duo Keith and Sally recall how their flat was wrecked by a storm.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to Lviv, Ukraine where ‘The House of Legends' Restaurant lets you explore the myths and legends of the city of Lviv all while enjoying the wonderful fresh local Ukrainian cuisine. Then we visit Philadelphia, Pennsylvania where the ‘Tattooed Mom' is designed to bring the art of street culture inside, it's also the home of the Beard and Moustache club of Philadelphia. Next up we race over to the ‘Corvette Diner' in San Diego, California where the 50's are alive and kicking and the servers sing and dance their way through the day with their bouffant hair dos, poodle skirts and plenty of good natured sass.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to Seattle, where ‘Teatro ZinZanni' brings you back to the 1962 World's Fair for a colourful collection of circus performances, comedy and classic cuisine of the era. Then things heat up in Ternopol, Ukraine at ‘Stary Mlyn' where a converted steam powered mill now houses a truly eccentric Ukrainian restaurant. Next up we roar into Chicago, where ‘Tommy Guns Garage' brings a 1920's Speakeasy back to life with mobsters, molls and a timeless Italian-themed menu. And finally we seek sanctuary in Paris, at ‘Le Refuge Des Fondus' where climbing over tables and drinking wine out of baby bottles is definitely de rigour.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World's Weirdest Restaurants takes you to ‘The Miner's Tavern' in Wieliczka, Poland where we dine at the bottom of a working salt mine amongst rooms and chambers peppered with ornate rock-salt structures. Then we pull up to ‘The Cove' in San Antonio, Texas to wash our car, do some laundry, shoot some hoops, and chow down at their family-friendly restaurant that features locally sourced ingredients. Next we're in Tokyo to sink our teeth into a fiendishly delicious gothic menu at ‘The Vampire Café'. And finally we burn rubber over to Alameda, California to the ‘Homeroom Racing Café' where a fresh Thai food menu is parked amongst the longest slot car track in the country.

programme.title: A Time Of Traitors
programme.desc: Kai's investigation of a Vermillion Warrior Helmet leads him to discover that Krux is alive and well in Ninjago, living under an assumed identity. Meanwhile, as the Vermillion Warriors go on a kidnapping spree, Lloyd struggles with his role as master-in-training and Nya does her best to reboot Zane, who was knocked off line in his first battle with the Vermillion.

programme.title: The Mask Of Deception
programme.desc: When an unknown criminal syndicate threatens the Royal Family, the Ninja are called back into action and must protect the royal princess and a fabled artifact that may hold supernatural powers. The ninja find themselves scattered to the four corners of the kingdom. Cole and Jay are searching in vain for some sign of Master Wu. Nya fights injustice in the north, while Kai and Zane attempt to fend off an angry lava beast in the west. This leaves Lloyd alone in Ninjago City. He rushes to the scene of a heist at Borg Tower and finds himself up against a team of highly trained operatives led by the mysterious masked MISTER-E. Lloyd fails to prevent the heist and an ancient artifact, the MASK OF DECEPTION, is stolen. Lloyd apprehends one of the criminals but the others escape. Dismayed by his failure, Lloyd calls the ninjas back to Ninjago. The friends are reunited and hope for a little rest and relaxation. These hopes are dashed with the arrival MASTER HUTCHINS, a servant of the Royal Family of Ninjago, who has been sent by the EMPEROR to request their help. A new criminal gang, SONS OF GARMADON (SOG), is attempting to acquire three ancient masks called the ONI MASKS, which are rumored to possess supernatural powers.

programme.title: The Jade Princess
programme.desc: In the wake of an assassination attempt targeting the royal family, the ninja invite the royal princess, HARUMI, into their makeshift family. Lloyd glimpses someone escaping over the rooftops with a sack on their back. Fearing it is the kidnapped princess, Lloyd takes up the chase! He discovers to his surprise, however, that the masked intruder is none other than the princess herself, who is not quite as docile or meek as she pretends. She has a habit of sneaking out of her chambers at night to feed the homeless who surround the Imperial Palace. This revelation only endears her to Lloyd more and Harumi and Lloyd quickly strike up a friendship. Unfortunately, trouble catches up to the ninja when the Sons Of Garmadon target the second Oni mask and attack the palace. The scope of the attack proves more than the Ninja were prepared for as the Sons of Garmadon detonate a series of subterranean bombs, bringing down part of the palace. Lloyd and Harumi escape onto the flying ship, DESTINY'S BOUNTY. But the victory is a pyrrhic one. The second Oni Mask has been stolen and Harumi's parents and Master Hutchins are feared lost.

programme.title: The Oni And The Dragon
programme.desc: While Princess Harumi learns to adjust to the life of a Ninja, Lloyd and Jay search for answers about the Oni Masks at Mystake's Tea house, while Cole and Zane attempt to infiltrate the Sons of Garmadon biker gang. Remembering that Lloyd managed to arrest one of the gang members at Borg Tower, the Ninja decide to interrogate him to ascertain the location of the third Oni Mask. In order to get him to talk, however, Cole suggests they visit MYSTAKE'S TEA HOUSE to obtain some "truth tea." The truth-tea backfires spectacularly when Cole accidentally switches cups and drinks the tea himself. Zane is able to salvage the situation, however, and obtains a lead. He learns that the Sons of Garmadon frequent a karaoke bar called LAUGHY'S. Zane and Cole don disguises to infiltrate the bar. Cole assumes the alter ego “Rocky Dangerbuff," while Zane adopts the subtler moniker "Snake Jaguar." In order to earn the gang's trust, Cole performs a karaoke routine that is a smash success. Unfortunately, during the routine, his disguise comes loose and he is exposed as a ninja. The Sons of Garmadon attack him, and Zane (who is still in disguise) is unable to intervene. Cole is taken prisoner while Zane is invited back to the Sons of Garmadon's secret base.

programme.title: Girls on Mission
programme.desc: Things are getting mixed up on Andrea's first day on the job at Heartlake City Juicebar.Mia and Stephanie have to use a little horse power at the Sunshine Ranch.Andrea relaxes at the beach while Emma is hard at work at her lifeguard tower.Olivia tapes a science show, with a little help from Mia's lemonade stand - and special effects!Emma and Stephanie accidentally rent a scary movie and suddenly there are beasts everywhere...Stephanie has to face her fears when the class gets an 'Animal Kingdom & 'school assignment.'

programme.title: The Pranks
programme.desc: The friends are using their talents to pull a prank on Olivia. But who gets the last laugh?Stephanie finds the perfect front page story for the school paper! It's almost too good to be true. Emma and Andrea go undercover to solve the mystery of the two Jacobs.

programme.title: The Anomaly
programme.desc: A surprise visit from the Chief Inspector of the Night Bureau forces Mateo to hide Z-Blob, who goes on an adventure in the heart of Brooklyn.

programme.title: Cheat Code
programme.desc: Competing over who can ask Zoey to join their Sheep Week team, Logan cheats and unwittingly endangers the video game based Cyber Realm.

programme.title: The Bigger Picture
programme.desc: When the kids meddle in their teacher's dream to find test answers, they realize that in dreams, sweet little Ms. Putnam isn't so sweet... or little!

programme.title: Short Sheeped
programme.desc: Logan's desperation to prove himself leads to his capture by the Nightmare King, which leaves his friends to face the Sheep Week finals alone.

programme.title: The Grim Escape
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers rush to save Logan from the Shadowkeep's dungeon, but the liberators soon become the prisoners in a nightmarish twist of fate.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Tightwad
programme.desc: Clay wakes up in the poor town of Nothing Hill which literally have nothing. Will Clay remember who he is and what he is fighting for. His friends try to help him, but Jorah Tightwad and his Bots get in the way. Clay as the Gray Knight wakes up far away in a place called Nothing Hill. A poor town where they literally have nothing. They harvest dust. Jorah Tightwad though has found that there is gold underneath the town. He convinces the confused Clay to help him put pressure on the poor townsfolk to give up their lots. This is an easy job for the strong Gray Knight. The NEXO KNIGHTS finally track him down and tries to convince him about who he is. But to the Gray Knight they are still his enemies, and a giant battle ensues in order to subdue the Gray Knight. At last, only Macy is left. When she begins to recite the Knights Code, some words and their meaning are able to get through the stone hard shell of the Gray Knight and the Evil that clouded him seems to disappear. Together they are able to return the ownership of the town to the villagers.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Viking: The Smurfs take Grandpa Smurf to the King's castle so that he can meet Peewit. But what with one thing and another (especially another), the Smurfs and Peewit are taken aboard a Viking long ship. The Vikings take Peewit to be their mythical Great Warrior, the one who is going to vanquish the Storm King. Can the Smurfs help Peewit out of his quandary?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Popular Smurf: Jokey's surprise exploding packages have been changed by a spell. Picture the practical joker's discombobulating when he realises that all the surprises that he hands to unsuspecting Smurfs contain nothing but real gifts! No more ka-boom, no more jokes, no more fun! Plus the unenviable new position of Most Popular Smurf in the Village, surrounded by admirers begging for more presents...

programme.title: Scruple's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Brenda, the little witch, feels rejected: no-one is taking her to this year's Broomstick Ball. Oh, if she could find some nice-looking boy... Then she meets Scruple, apprentice of the evil wizard Gargamel. He's so handsome, and available too! What she does not know is that Scruple's only interest is her magic wand. What the Smurfs know is that they're going to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: Papa's Day Off
programme.desc: The Smurfs decide Papa needs a rest, so they agree to work out their problems without him. Papa feels obsolete but his wise friend, Homnibus, shows how the Smurfs couldn't get along without him. When Papa returns in time to fix a leaking dam, he feels useful again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - One Good Smurf Deserves Another: Handy Smurf has saved Clumsy from a horrible fate. Clumsy swears eternal devotion to his savior and does his best to repay his debt… With awkward results. A clever scheme is needed to stop Clumsy's well-meant catastrophes...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: Smurfing For Ghosts
programme.desc: Peewit is at the castle of his friends Selwyn and Tallulah when Uncle Fenwick, the friendly ghost, asks for his help in chasing a few relatives who've come to haunt him... Peewit has to get help from the Smurfs, and a merry chase begins...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Journey To The Centre Of The Smurf: Winter is setting in on the Village of the Smurfs. The little Smurfs are freezing. But what is Clumsy doing with this strange rock he's discovered? And why is Miner Smurf so enthusiastic about their new discovery? Surely, one more addition to Clumsy's rock collection is not worth all this hoopla... The Smurfs will discover danger and surprises when they go underground.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Gingerbread Smurfs: Brainy feels up to the occasion when he starts the recipe for cookies. He is sure to win the contest: he borrowed a recipe from Papa Smurf's Book of Magic. But a big surprise, and some nasty happenings, await poor Brainy... and the whole Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Wedding Day: When the flower fairy Nymph arrives at the Smurf Village, all the Smurfs fall for her charm and wit. And soon they learn that she is to be some sort of Mama Smurf to them...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: Smurfing In Sign Language
programme.desc: The Smurfs meet a woodland elf, who teaches them sign language after Gargamel inflicts a no-speaking potion on them.

programme.title: The Gargoyle Of Quarrel Castle
programme.desc: In Quarrel Castle, you almost never hear a kind word. Both Selwyn the Warlock and Tallulah, his witch-mate, spend their time quarrelling. Tharp, their pet gargoyle, takes refuge in the Village of Smurfs. But something terrible is going to happen....

programme.title: Champions: Sweden
programme.desc: Three-time Olympic medallist and 2012 FIFA World Women's Coach of the Year Pia Sundhage recalls her reaction at being called up to join the Swedish women's national team. Speaking to Stina Blackstenius, FIFA Women's World Cup Bronze Medal and two Olympic Games Silver Medal winner, and Molly Johansson, both players for BK Häcken, Pia explains her belief that football gave her a way of life. She relates the feelings she had when she took part in the Olympic Games, and how playing in France made her stronger, while Molly shares her goals for the future.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year's favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team's number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: SEVE

He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Germany's Mystic Forest
programme.desc: 2.000 rivers and streams dig deep into the underground and transport their water into reservoirs or "Germany's Wild Amazon", the Wupper. These forests and rivers, together with heathlands and moors, are home to a diverse fauna. Martens, badgers, wild boars, hares, roe deer, and red deer, even black grouse and hazel deer find shelter in these parts. Wolves also have a dominant presence, not to mention those who live underground, such as lizards, bats, and snakes. Accompany us on a journey where we explore every corner of this rugged land. Climb underground into the Bergisches Land, through the vast hidden cave systems that sprawl far beneath the forests. There is also much to be discovered in the water, dive with us in crystal clear streams and rivers with their diverse flora and fauna.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: Of Flying Foxes and Heat Waves
programme.desc: While the Tolga Bat Hospital is looking after endangered flying foxes, researchers are using thermographic cameras to search for flying foxes and koalas. But they can also detect bush and wildfire more quickly.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: Of Sea Turtles and Coral Reefs
programme.desc: The Cairns Turtle Rehabilitation Center (CTRC) raises and cares for sick, or injured turtles, while the Schmidt Ocean Institute goes on a diving mission with a high-tech underwater rover. In this way, we learn firsthand about the state of Australia's sensitive marine animals' natural habitat and what needs to be done to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.desc: Tasmania's Bonorong Wildlife Sanctuary used to be a traditional wildlife park - now it is an innovative and active wildlife sanctuary and home to the famous Tasmanian Devil, to wombats, and many other native species. But unfortunately, "Tassie Devils" are particularly endangered by the Devil Facial Tumor Disease (DFTD). We accompany the team of young, ambitious scientists on their fight against the disease.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. Today, hardly anything threatens the natural habitats of these animals as much as the desertification of the forests. We let the drones fly and are there when a new tree is planted.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.desc: Visiting the fenced nature reserve Arid Recovery in southern Australia, we witness the care of an injured kangaroo and follow researchers at the Hidden Vale Wildlife Centre near Brisbane as they train native animals to detect tracks of threatening predators and then move to safety.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: Of Fairy Penguins and GPS Trackers
programme.desc: Australia's largest fur seal colony is located on Phillip Island. Night after night, a breathtaking spectacle takes place here: At sunset, countless fairy penguins return from their hunt for fish. In the station near the penguin colony, pioneering scientific research is conducted around the cute animals. We learn how dedicated scientists are trying to secure the future of the fairy penguins with the help of GPS trackers.

programme.title: Wild & Wide Awake
programme.sub-title: From the Mediterranean to the Alps
programme.desc: The first part of the spring journey takes us from the Spanish inland to the rugged Atlantic and to the Mediterranean, through the French Provence, and finally into the Alps. Along the way, flamingos perform their bizarre dancing rituals, wild horses storm through the wetland… While the North is still covered by snow and ice, the South will soon turn into a blooming garden and every creature is enjoying the first signs of the awakening.

programme.title: Bike Heroes : Eddie Lawson
programme.desc: A small group of racers dominated the motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship during the ultra-competitive era of the late 1980s and early 1990s they are the Bike Heroes. Chief among them was Eddie Lawson, who started his career in the era of Sheene and Roberts and ended it racing alongside Rainey, Schwantz and Gardner. Along the way the American legend contested 127 GPs, finishing on the podium a staggering 78 times, claiming 31 wins and being crowned World Champion four times.

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Modern Explorers
programme.desc: Jokke, Niccolo and Espen travel to China. They participate in a wingsuit flying competition. The platform they jump from is just like the mountains: gigantic.

programme.title: Modern Explorers
programme.desc: Wingsuit flying is among the most dangerous sports in the world. How do Espen, Jokke and Niccolo manage to stay alive?
